snippet.textDisplay: Memorable game that was sort of mediocre. It would be absolutely amazing if they could make a second game, with everything revamped to a higher quality.

snippet.textDisplay: The only problem I had with the combat was Jack's constant grunting and noise making as he swung a weapon. I do not remember if there was a way to mute Jack and party's grunts during combat but it was a minor issue I had in an otherwise fantastic RPG on the PS2.
snippet.textOriginal: The only problem I had with the combat was Jack's constant grunting and noise making as he swung a weapon. I do not remember if there was a way to mute Jack and party's grunts during combat but it was a minor issue I had in an otherwise fantastic RPG on the PS2.

snippet.textDisplay: Radiata Stories was the shit, one of the top PS2 games.  The music, battles, story, and the characters were all awesome.  Hopefully, more songs will get on the list.  I'm thinking Paya-Paya in particular.  Also, Jack Russell was the shit!  Greatest...Character...Ever!
snippet.textOriginal: Radiata Stories was the shit, one of the top PS2 games.  The music, battles, story, and the characters were all awesome.  Hopefully, more songs will get on the list.  I'm thinking Paya-Paya in particular.  Also, Jack Russell was the shit!  Greatest...Character...Ever!
